start.text:
You are at the farm. Its presence overlooks your house. A road leading to the marketplace snakes its way to the side.

You...

choices.option: Take a look at the plot

look.text:
You take a look at the plot. It's quite big. Impressive.

You...

market.text: You visit the marketplace. It is filled with sellers and customers.

market2.text:
You go back to the familiar sight of sellers and customers. It hasn't changed since you last left.

You...

buyseeds.text: You go to the seed section to buy seeds. There are a couple of options you can buy.

sleep.text: You fall asleep and never wake up. The end.
